Klasse Stich

java.lang.Object
spiel.Stich
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class Stich extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a single trick (Stich) in the card game. Tracks the cards played by each player in order.
Siehe auch:
  • Serialisierte Form

    Stich()
    Constructs an empty trick.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Stich

      public Stich()
      Constructs an empty trick.

  • Methodendetails

    • getCards

      public List<Karte> getCards()

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Spieler player, Karte card)
      Adds a card played by a player to the trick.
      Parameter:
      player - the player who played the card
      card - the card played

    • getAllCards

      public Set<Map.Entry<Spieler,Karte>> getAllCards()
      Returns all cards played in this trick, along with the corresponding players.
      Gibt zurück:
      a set of entries (Spieler, Karte)

    • getCardCount

      public int getCardCount()
      Returns the number of cards currently in the trick.
      Gibt zurück:
      the number of cards

    • getFirstCard

      public Karte getFirstCard()
      Returns the first card played in the trick.
      Gibt zurück:
      the first card, or null if none

    • getCardByPlayer

      public Karte getCardByPlayer(Spieler player)
      Returns the card played by the specified player.
      Parameter:
      player - the player
      Gibt zurück:
      the card played by that player, or null if not found

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the trick, removing all cards.

    • getWinner

      public Spieler getWinner(Farbe trumpSuit, boolean undenufe, boolean obenabe)
      Determines the winner of this trick based on trump, lead suit, and game mode.
      Parameter:
      trumpSuit - the trump suit of the game
      undenufe - true if Undenufe mode (low beats high, no trump)
      obenabe - true if Obenabe mode (high beats low, no trump)
      Gibt zurück:
      the winning player of this trick

    • getTotalPoints

      public int getTotalPoints(String gameMode, Farbe trumpSuit)
      Calculates the total point value of all cards in the trick based on game mode.
      Parameter:
      gameMode - the current game mode ("OBENABE", "UNDENUFE", or trump suit as string)
      trumpSuit - the trump suit (can be null if OBENABE or UNDENUFE)
      Gibt zurück:
      total points in the trick
